title: A MATTER OF TASTE... MORAL TASTE
description: ENJOY PHILOSOPHY MEETS WEEKLY EVERY SUNDAY BETWEEN 11.30 AND 14.30 AT EDUARDO VII PARK, HERE:\*\* [https://goo.gl/maps/5e3jKFEweXkNvDdK6](https://goo.gl/maps/5e3jKFEweXkNvDdK6) **ITS THE GARDEN BETWEEN THE ‚ÄúCARLOS LOPES PAVILLION‚Äù AND THE ‚ÄúPRAIA NO PARQUE‚Äù RESTAURANT AT EDUARDO VII PARK.** THIS IS A GROUP FOR ANYONE INTERESTED IN ENJOYING PHILOSOPHY. NO PRIOR KNOWLEDGE IS REQUIRED. ONLY ETERNAL CURIOSITY AND THE PLEASURE OF KNOWLEDGE. PLS KEEP UPDATED of any changes and updates on our WhatsApp Group: [Enjoy Philosophy Lisbon Group Access-Link](https://chat.whatsapp.com/EgaLvlLCAbSL00cYmhpOSu) We will learn, debate, enjoy and investigate philosophers and diverse themes from the philosophical perspective. Each reunion is structured as a conversation among all attendees about that day s philosopher softly moderated by the organizer. The conversation will kick-off from the very brief suggested reading providing easy access to all attendees both to the philosopher and the conversation. Let¬¥s be greek and dive today on‚Ä¶ **TASTE... the taste of Ethics. A sweet and sour taste.** **Since the experience of acting ethically often involves a deeply emotional process... Yes, something apparently beyond our clear knowledge tastes right... or tastes wrong. And that arrives in such a dimension that some quite clever minds, as the eternally challenging David Hume, reduced Ethics to a matter of sentiment. Yes. As liking a sandwich.** **Or not. Although not totally arbitrary, a sentiment finally, with all the misterious genealogy and irrationality sentiments involve.** **We are glad to kill the cockroach that has entered our home but feel terrible seeing a beautiful butterfly splatter on our car windshield. Why? Both are insects and both are invading our property in a way, but we don‚Äôt often share the same sentiment towards them.** **The claim would make any ethical debate doomed to failure given the difficulty of rationalizing the sentiments in order to translate them into debatable arguments, defensible and criticizable.** **So, lets think about taste... moral taste...**

Prepaid only. Ô∏è **[Click here to register for the event](https://luma.com/f2smu7zz)** Ô∏è ‚ú® **Speed Friending: Spring-Is-Coming Edition ‚Äì a one-night event designed to help you connect with people in Lisbon.** ‚ö° Winter is done playing games. Spring is coming. Longer days. Softer air. That ‚Äú*maybe I should go outside and meet people*‚Äù feeling. **This night is for that moment** ‚Äî when you‚Äôre ready to come back to life socially and wake up after long rainy days. *‚≠ê Short, intentional 1-on-1 conversations. A simple, comfortable way to meet new people. Just sit down. Talk. Connect. Like you mean it.* **Why you should come:** * Because you‚Äôre tired of shouting small talk across crowded bars; * Because WhatsApp groups don‚Äôt make real friends; * Because Lisbon deserves a better way to connect. \*\* So, how does it work?\*\* ‚Äì The space will be set up with small tables for two. ‚Äì You‚Äôll have a series of **1-on-1 conversations**, each lasting 10‚Äì15 minutes. ‚Äì You don‚Äôt have to approach anyone. You just sit down ‚Äî and talk. ‚Äì We guide the flow and tell you when to rotate. ‚úÖ This is a **guided**, one-on-one event. ‚úÖ Each table has **optional prompt cards** to help move past small talk. ‚úÖ No awkward moments when trying to start a conversation. At the end, you‚Äôll have time to reconnect with anyone you clicked, grab a drink, and hang out in a more open setting. ‚ú®Structured enough to make it easy. ‚ú®Relaxed enough to feel real. And because it‚Äôs **Saturday**, the night doesn‚Äôt have to end there ‚Äî people usually leave in small, newly-formed groups and keep the evening going ‚Äã **Who It‚Äôs For** * You live/work in Lisbon (or just landed) and want a real circle here. * You‚Äôre tired of surface-level conversations. * ‚ÄãYou‚Äôd rather connect one-on-one than shout over a crowd. * You‚Äôre curious, respectful, open-minded and looking for something real. \*\* The details\*\* Ô∏è **When:** Saturday, 7th of March at 16:00 **Where:** Lisbon (exact venue shared with confirmed guests ‚Äì to make it natural and avoid walk-ins) Ô∏è **Event fee:** ‚Ç¨7 (early-bird)/‚Ç¨10 (general admission)/‚Ç¨15 (late bird). Prepaid only. **I WANT TO JOIN** **[Click here to register for the event](https://luma.com/f2smu7zz)** **‚ùìFAQ** **‚Äã‚Äã- Can I come alone?** Yes! Most people do. This event is perfect for solo attendees. **\- Do I have to talk to everyone?** You‚Äôll be matched with almost everyone ‚Äî but nothing is forced. You can take a break whenever you need. **\- I‚Äôm shy ‚Äî is this for me?** Absolutely. The format actually helps ‚Äî you don‚Äôt need to approach anyone or come up with the perfect opener. **\- Is this like speed dating?** The format is similar (1-on-1 conversations that rotate), but there‚Äôs no romantic pressure. This is about connection, not dating. **\- Why is the location secret?** We‚Äôll share the venue only with confirmed guests. title: Lightning Talks üí°‚ö° @Tribe Social Club
description: Come join us to share ideas, learn about odd topics / passions / curiosities, and meet interesting people. As always, the event is **free to attend**, but we appreciate RSVPs so that we can have adequate seating setup in advance of the event. The Lightning Talks format remains the same - anyone can sign up to give a talk, and will have **5 minutes** (strictly timed!) to talk about a topic of their choosing, followed by **5 minutes** of open questions from the audience. The only rule is no pitching of one's business - the ethos of this event is to inspire and educate, it is not a sales opportunity. Please respect this rule. We will have a projector as usual, for any visuals you would like to include in your talk. We want to encourage new people who have never given a talk to try presenting. The bar is low and it's a receptive audience and a great way to wade into public speaking. We are a friendly, and encouraging crowd. We appreciate challenging questions when rooted in genuine curiosity, in an atmosphere of kindness and respect. If you want to present **please add yourself to the lineup via [our Telegram](https://t.me/+ZB0vzNhg5MtjZjM0)** \- or post in the event chat here on Meetup and we will add you if there are spots available\. Planned schedule 19:30 - First round of talks 20:30 - Break 21:00 - Second round of talks 22:00 - Mingle and discuss over drinks/snacks Please note: the event is free to attend but there is a ‚Ç¨5 minimum spend at the bar. This is on the honor system but please support the venue that supports us. **About the venue** Tribe Social Club is an event space, co-work & bar in the heart of Lisbon, overlooking the beautiful Pra√ßa Lu√≠s de Cam√µes that is focused on bringing like minded people together, for both work & play.
